item.description:
The purpose of this group is to share our spirituality and spiritual experience(s), discuss our paths and investigate the ideas and techniques of all various spiritualities and philosophies.

Everyone has a spark of God/ the Source/ One etc (whatever finite word we want to call It) in them, to the extent they don’t loose or "sell" their soul.  If we listen to this Spark, it will lead us on our own unique, individual, wonderful and magical path back to the Source.

The focus of this meetup is to share our paths, harmonize and amplify our spiritual vibrations, and enhance, quicken and help catalyze the evolution to higher and deeper spiritual levels.

We don't have to study in a monastery for decades to become enlightened - there are simple and powerful but subtle methods for fast progress.

Here is a wonderful site of free online books spirituality of the highest levels, including precursors to the "Law of Attraction" of a century ago.

http://divinelibrary.org/archives.htm#TopOfPage

We discuss our paths and evolution.  There will usually be a short talk on some spiritual subject and we also ask for suggested topics to discuss. Occasionally we have experts visit and give a talk.  If someone in the group would like to give a talk, let me know.  Bill has been studying, practicing/experiencing most (bolded) of the following philosophies/traditions below & others for > 30 years, from the age of 15.  Subjects that we will have discussions, talks, & classes about are whatever you are interested in and:


Mysticism

Your ideas, experience(s), progress,  paths....!

Eastern Philosophies: Buddhism, Sufism, Hinduism, Sikhism, Chan, Zen

Healing, Intuition, Meditation, Techniques to enter alpha, trance, or multidimensional creative state.

Christianity - Techniques and writings of saints & Mystics - Hildegard, John of Cross, Initiators of the orders

Mysticism, Gnosticism, Shamanism, Mystery Religions

Near Death Experiences, Out of Body Experiences (OBE's or Astral Projection)

Types of Yoga -

  1. Physical (Hatha, Prana...)
  2. Mental (Jjana, Mantra...)
  3. Spiritual (Raja, Karma, Bhakjti...)

Law of Attraction

Powerful Techniques for Awakening

Creativity

Spiritual Experiences:

  1. Christ/Krishna Consciousness
  2. Cosmic Consciousness
  3. Zen Enlightenment
  4. Holy Spirit

Archaic Spirituality & Writings - Egyptian Religion, Zoroastrianism, Mithracism, Book of Enoch, Apocrophia, Philokalia, Gnostic Gospels, Gospel of Thomas, Mary Madalene, etc.
